name: Chamomile Lime Rickey
description: A floral twist on a classic, this delicious fizzy limeade is the perfect front-porch sipper on a warm afternoon. The chamomile adds some sunshine to this refresher, and little ones will love it as well. You just might find yourself making — or craving — this every summer weekend.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup freshly squeezed lime juice, plus more to taste
2 tablespoons Chamomile Simple Syrup, plus more to taste
Thin lime slices or a fresh organic edible chamomile flower, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the lime juice and chamomile simple syrup in a large (16- to 18-ounce) tumbler and stir to combine. Taste and add more lime juice or syrup, if you’d like.
Fill with ice, top off with the seltzer and gently mix to combine. Garnish with lime slices, or an organic edible flower, if you are feeling extra fancy.
